nodes.text: Miles Richardson (born July 15, 1963) is a British actor who portrayed Diles Anevi in Solo: A Star Wars Story, which credited him as "Regional Governor." Although both the film's credits and an image in the official guide show Richardson, the scene in the film clearly shows a different actor.

He is best known for his roles in Flushed Away and The Best Offer[source?] and for playing the character of Irving Braxiatel in the Doctor Who spin-off audio dramas Bernice Summerfield, Gallifrey and Doctor Who – The Monthly Adventures, all produced by Big Finish Productions.
